slide.description: Reitmeier is a commercial property HVAC company who brings balance and control to internal working environments. Their website was designed to reflect their new branding and build on their company values. This robust site offers valuable information with a responsive design structure.
slide.footnote: Credits: Created while employed at Kinesis.
slide.title: Homepage

slide.description: Top tier pages were designed with unique page structures. The sections that make up these page structures are both reusable and editable, pulling content from multiple areas throughout the site.
slide.footnote: Credits: Created while employed at Kinesis.
slide.title: Unique Page

slide.description: General page styles offer featured images and specialized sidebars with custom widgets.
slide.footnote: Credits: Created while employed at Kinesis.
slide.title: Internal Page

slide.description: Case Studies were created as custom post types with a unique index page.
slide.footnote: Credits: Created while employed at Kinesis.
slide.title: Case Study Index

slide.description: The contact forms allow users to fill out customer quotes and service requests directly on the site.
slide.footnote: Credits: Created while employed at Kinesis.
slide.title: Form
